markdownRemark.html:
I’m Dani.

People know me as a mobile developer and “The Javascript guy” cuz I speak about javascript and javascript frameworks a lot in tech events and communities in Chennai. I love programming and building cool apps and that’s what I do for a living. I code by the day and sleep by the night while studying particle physics over coffee breaks.

The love for software engineering is a result my love for problem solving which is still keeping me explore different field of science and engineering.
